sourceText: I believe you. You are not in trouble. It is not your fault. This is a big thing and we will find a way to get the help you need. I wonder where we can go for help…?
text: I believe you. You are not in trouble. It is not your fault. This is a big thing and we will find a way to get the help you need. I wonder where we can go for help…?

sourceText: Yes, they will know what to do. Of course, I will come with you. Remember, this is not your fault. I love you and we will get through this.
text: Yes, they will know what to do. Of course, I will come with you. Remember, this is not your fault. I love you and we will get through this.

sourceText: … he held me down…told me I would be in trouble if I told anybody…
text: … he held me down…told me I would be in trouble if I told anybody…

sourceText: What’s wrong, my dear? Come and sit by me and tell me what happened.
text: What’s wrong, my dear? Come and sit by me and tell me what happened.

sourceText: Take your time... I am listening.
text: Take your time... I am listening.

sourceText: The clinic? But could you come with me?
text: The clinic? But could you come with me?
